author: Stay Calm, Be Happy | Rahul Pant🇮🇳
text:
#strategy How many customer can you get in quickly and iterate vs How many customer will love what you're building?

#productmanagement

author: Stay Calm, Be Happy | Rahul Pant🇮🇳
text:
"Understanding of Technology, Design & Architecture of a Product early on for B2C space." @_sameernigam 

#productmanagement

author: Stay Calm, Be Happy | Rahul Pant🇮🇳
Stay Calm, Be Happy | Rahul Pant🇮🇳
text:
"In an engineering mindset, you can build very scalable products but no body is willing to pay for it, if you do not understand consumer needs or the product market fit." @_sameernigam 

#productmanagement

author: Stay Calm, Be Happy | Rahul Pant🇮🇳
text:
1) Understand Engineering well.

2) Understand Business well.

3) They need to be consumer first.

"These are prerequisites not differentiators, successful PMs are able to balance all these three primary sort of needs effectively." @_sameernigam 

#productmanagement

author: Stay Calm, Be Happy | Rahul Pant🇮🇳
text:
What is the kind of product that you're building?

Why consumers will love it?

How can one make sure that the product is viable?

Can the product scale?

#productmanagement

author: Stay Calm, Be Happy | Rahul Pant🇮🇳
text:
The best product managers understand the end needs.

#productmanagement
